forumNotes.author: friske
forumNotes.content:
I have installed the driver; HORM is enabled.

If i shutdown the data are lost; it work.

But if i hibernate it not resume but restart.

I think it might be due to winload.exe and Winresume.exe.

Someone can give me help on this?

I have also winload.exe and Winresume.exe but "Windows verify digital signature error".

forumNotes.author: Guest_AnonVendetta_*
forumNotes.content: Hmm, is Win97 some super-secret version of Windows that only elite hackers are aware of? To my knowledge Microsoft never released a Windows 97.

forumNotes.author: Zoso
forumNotes.content:
hi friske,  

what is "i driver"?  

HORM = Hibernate Once Resume Many  

so I think that means you only hibernate when you have the set-up you want to resume on every start up. Im not certain about this though but I am certain the the "O" in HORM stands for "Once"  

also see this post about your error message: [http://reboot.pro/to...xe/#entry196982](http://reboot.pro/topic/20910-digital-signature-of-winloadexe/#entry196982 "")
